changes.title: Added the Branch22 > Create Pull Request menu item
Windows: Opening links doesn't bring the browser to the front
Added the `github` command line tool
Cloning a repository's wiki
Update banner message clarifies that only Desktop needs to be restarted displays number of changed files instead of dot
Desktop needs to be restarted displays number of changed files instead of dot
Added the Branch22 > Create Pull Request menu item
Notification displayed in History tab when the base branch moves ahead of the current branch
Added the `github` command line tool
Error when checking out a PR from a fork
Switch to history view for default branch when deleting current branch during a compare
